cofh.lib.util

Class WeightedRandomBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • WeightedRandom.Item
      • cofh.lib.util.WeightedRandomBlock

  • public final class WeightedRandomBlock
extends WeightedRandom.Item
    This class essentially allows for ores to be generated in clusters, with Features randomly choosing one or more blocks from a weighted list.
